text: @realDonaldTrump This coronavirus is bs, over 223k people die from malpractice in the US each year, we don't lockdown doctor's, 1k people a day die in car's, we don't stop car's from being made, the flu killed 80k, we don't shut down, something else going on, and i think it's not good... https://t.co/zpG8R2of0L
